title: Screen Design:  "Radio Active Guard House," Front Side
medium: Black marking pen, brush and gray wash, red and pink watercolor (?), graphite on white tracing paper.
description: Four panel screen on wheels.  At left, a tall narrow guardhouse with pitched roof and blank papers tacked to side wall.  The guardhouse is attached at right to a metal gate with red sign.  To the right, a black panel with bunny head cut out near top and stepped cut out at bottom.  On top of gate is a red dome with two red poles.
name: Drawing
